config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the value from the options passed to the InstantGI constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on how often the InstantGI class is instantiated and the options passed to it. It is triggered whenever an InstantGI object is created with the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration specified.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is significant as it determines the number of photons used for InstantGI calculations. A higher value can result in better quality but may also increase computation time and memory usage.
